title: From an Epistle of the Same to the Blessed Amphilochius on the Difference of Meats.
author: Appendix

paragraphs.text: From an Epistle of the Same to the Blessed Amphilochius on the Difference of Meats.
(Found translated in Lib. cit., p. 287, part of Epistle ccxxxvj.)
Against the Encratites, who would not eat flesh.
